title: Galati Gear GL6414 Heavy Weapons Rifle Case Black, 63
description: This heavy weapons case measures 63" externally to carry 50 caliber rifles and other heavy weapons such as the ArmaLite ar-50. Holds a rifle with scope, accessories and ammunition. Features a main wrap-around carry strap and two removable carry straps on each end for two man carry. Inside the case are twelve elastic loops to hold .50 Cal ammo. Includes a fully padded adjustable muzzle wrap. Inside accessory pocket measures 5" x 1 1.2" x 11" with Velcro closure. Two cinch straps with hook and loop closures tighten to secure the weapon. Features full length dual lockable YKK zippers with a padded zipper protector. Folds flat to use as a shooting mat if needed. Constructed of 600D nylon with 1/2" closed cell foam padding. Polymer buckles and D-rings. Outside hook and loop for patch attachment. Black. Specifications: - color: black - external dimensions: 63" x 17" x 3.5" - internal dimensions: 62" x 14 1/2" x 3 1/4"
